00032 class StateServer : public QMCalculator
00033 {
00034 public:
00035

00037    ~StateServer() { };

00042     bool EvaluateFrame(Topology *top);

00068 
00069 void StateServer::Initialize(Topology *top, Property *opt) {
00070     
00071     string tag = "options.stateserver";
00072 
00073     // Tabular output
00074     if ( opt->exists(tag+".out") ) {
00075         _outfile = opt->get(tag+".out").as< string > ();
00076     }
00077     else {
00078         _outfile = "stateinfo.out";
00079     }
00080     // PDB output
00081     if ( opt->exists(tag+".pdb") ) {
00082         _pdbfile = opt->get(tag+".pdb").as< string > ();
00083     }
00084     else {
00085         _pdbfile = "system.pdb";
00086     }
00087 
00088     string keys = "";
00089     if ( opt->exists(tag+".keys") ) {
00090         keys = opt->get(tag+".keys").as< string > ();
00091     }
00092 
00093     Tokenizer tok_keys(keys, " ");
00094     tok_keys.ToVector(_keys);
00095 
00096 }
00097 
00098 bool StateServer::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
00099 
00100     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00101     // Topology - Sites - Pairs //
00102     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00103 
00104     vector< string > ::iterator key;    
00105     bool writeTrajectory = false;
00106     
00107     string outfile = boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getDatabaseId())+ "_"
00108                      + _outfile;
00109 
00110 
00111     FILE *out = NULL;
00112     out = fopen(outfile.c_str(), "w");
00113     for (key = _keys.begin(); key < _keys.end(); key++ ) {
00114 
00115         cout << endl << "... ... Write " << flush;
00116 
00117         if (*key == "topology") {
00118 
00119                 cout << "topology, ";
00120 
00121                 fprintf(out, "           # +++++++++++++++++++ # \n");
00122                 fprintf(out, "           # MD|QM Topology Info # \n");
00123                 fprintf(out, "           # +++++++++++++++++++ # \n\n");
00124 
00125                 DownloadTopology(out, top);
00126         }
00127         else if (*key == "sites") {
00128 
00129                 cout << "sites, ";
00130 
00131                 fprintf(out, "           # ++++++++++++++++++++ # \n");
00132                 fprintf(out, "           # Segments in Database # \n");
00133                 fprintf(out, "           # ++++++++++++++++++++ # \n\n");
00134 
00135                 DownloadSegments(out, top);
00136         }
00137 
00138         else if (*key == "pairs") {
00139 
00140                 cout << "pairs, ";
00141 
00142                 fprintf(out, "           # +++++++++++++++++ # \n");
00143                 fprintf(out, "           # Pairs in Database # \n");
00144                 fprintf(out, "           # +++++++++++++++++ # \n\n");
00145 
00146                 DownloadPairs(out, top);
00147 
00148         }
00149 
00150         else if (*key == "ilist") {
00151 
00152                 cout << "integrals, ";
00153 
00154                 fprintf(out, "           # +++++++++++++++++++++ # \n");
00155                 fprintf(out, "           # Integrals in Database # \n");
00156                 fprintf(out, "           # +++++++++++++++++++++ # \n\n");
00157 
00158                 DownloadIList(out, top);
00159 
00160         }
00161 
00162         else if (*key == "elist") {
00163 
00164                 cout << "energies, ";
00165 
00166                 fprintf(out, "           # +++++++++++++++++++++++++ # \n");
00167                 fprintf(out, "           # Site energies in Database # \n");
00168                 fprintf(out, "           # +++++++++++++++++++++++++ # \n\n");
00169 
00170                 DownloadEList(out, top);
00171 
00172         }
00173 
00174         else if (*key == "xmp") {
00175 
00176                 cout << "XMP input, ";
00177 
00178                 FILE *out_xmp;
00179                 string xmp_file = "xmp.table";
00180                 out_xmp = fopen(xmp_file.c_str(), "w");
00181 
00182                 WriteXMP(out_xmp, top);
00183 
00184                 fclose(out_xmp);
00185         }
00186 
00187         else if (*key == "emp") {
00188 
00189                 cout << "EMP input, ";
00190 
00191                 FILE *out_emp;
00192                 string emp_file = "emp.table";
00193                 out_emp = fopen(emp_file.c_str(), "w");
00194 
00195                 WriteEMP(out_emp, top);
00196 
00197                 fclose(out_emp);
00198         }
00199 
00200         else {
00201                 cout << "ERROR (Invalid key " << *key << ") ";
00202         }
00203 
00204         cout << "done. " << flush;
00205 
00206         fprintf(out, "\n\n");
00207     }
00208     fclose(out);
00209 
00210 
00211     if (writeTrajectory) {
00212 
00213     // ++++++++++++++++++ //
00214     // MD, QM Coordinates //
00215     // ++++++++++++++++++ //
00216         // Segments
00217         string pdbfile = boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getDatabaseId())
00218                          + "_conjg_" + _pdbfile;
00219 
00220         out = fopen(pdbfile.c_str(), "w");
00221         top->WritePDB(out);
00222         fclose(out); 
00223 
00224 
00225         // Fragments
00226         pdbfile = boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getDatabaseId())
00227                          + "_rigid_" + _pdbfile;
00228 
00229         out = fopen(pdbfile.c_str(), "w");
00230         vector<Segment*> ::iterator segIt;
00231         for (segIt = top->Segments().begin();
00232              segIt < top->Segments().end();
00233              segIt++) {
00234             Segment *seg = *segIt;
00235             seg->WritePDB(out);
00236         }
00237         fclose(out);
00238 
00239     }
00240 
00241 }
00242 
00243 void StateServer::DownloadTopology(FILE *out, Topology *top) {
00244 
00245     fprintf(out, "Topology Database ID %3d \n", top->getDatabaseId());
00246     fprintf(out, "  Periodic Box: %2.4f %2.4f %2.4f | %2.4f %2.4f %2.4f "
00247                  "| %2.4f %2.4f %2.4f \n",
00248             top->getBox().get(0,0),
00249             top->getBox().get(0,1),
00250             top->getBox().get(0,2),
00251             top->getBox().get(1,0),
00252             top->getBox().get(1,1),
00253             top->getBox().get(1,2),
00254             top->getBox().get(2,0),
00255             top->getBox().get(2,1),
00256             top->getBox().get(2,2) );
00257 
00258     fprintf(out, "  Step number %7d \n", top->getStep());
00259     fprintf(out, "  Time          %2.3f \n", top->getTime());
00260 
00261     int N_mol = top->Molecules().size();
00262     int N_seg = top->Segments().size();
00263     int N_atm = top->Atoms().size();
00264     int N_nbs = top->NBList().size();
00265 
00266     fprintf(out, "  # Molecules %7d \n", N_mol);
00267     fprintf(out, "  # Segments  %7d \n", N_seg);
00268     fprintf(out, "  # Atoms     %7d \n", N_atm);
00269     fprintf(out, "  # Pairs     %7d \n", N_nbs);
00270     
00271 }
00272 
00273 void StateServer::DownloadSegments(FILE *out, Topology *top) {
00274 
00275     vector< Segment* > ::iterator segit;
00276 
00277     for (segit = top->Segments().begin();
00278             segit < top->Segments().end();
00279             segit++) {
00280 
00281         Segment *seg = *segit;
00282         fprintf(out, "SiteID %5d %5s | xyz %8.3f %8.3f %8.3f "
00283                      "| SiteE(intra) C %2.4f A %2.4f "
00284                      "| Lambdas: NC %2.4f CN %2.4f NA %2.4f AN %2.4f "
00285                      "| SiteE(pol+estat) C %2.4f N %2.4f A %2.4f     \n",
00286                 seg->getId(),
00287                 seg->getName().c_str(),
00288                 seg->getPos().getX(),
00289                 seg->getPos().getY(),
00290                 seg->getPos().getZ(),
00291                 seg->getU_cC_nN(1),
00292                 seg->getU_cC_nN(-1),
00293                 seg->getU_nC_nN(1),
00294                 seg->getU_cN_cC(1),
00295                 seg->getU_nC_nN(-1),
00296                 seg->getU_cN_cC(-1),
00297                 seg->getEMpoles(1),
00298                 seg->getEMpoles(0),
00299                 seg->getEMpoles(-1) );
00300     }
00301 }
00302 
00303 void StateServer::DownloadPairs(FILE *out, Topology *top) {
00304     QMNBList::iterator nit;
00305 
00306     for (nit = top->NBList().begin();
00307          nit != top->NBList().end();
00308          nit++) {
00309 
00310         QMPair *pair = *nit;
00311 
00312         int ghost;
00313         if (pair->HasGhost()) { ghost = 1; }
00314         else { ghost = 0; }
00315 
00316         fprintf(out, "PairID %5d  | Seg1 %4d Seg2 %4d dR %2.4f PBC? %1d | "
00317                      "lOuter %1.4f J2 %1.8f r12 %2.4f r21 %2.4f \n",
00318                 pair->getId(),
00319                 pair->first->getId(),
00320                 pair->second->getId(),
00321                 pair->Dist(),
00322                 ghost,
00323                 0.0, // pair->getLambdaO(),
00324                 0.0, // pair->calcJeff2(),
00325                 0.0, // pair->getRate12(),
00326                 0.0 ); // pair->getRate21() );
00327     }
00328 }
00329 
00330 void StateServer::DownloadIList(FILE *out, Topology *top) {
00331     QMNBList::iterator nit;
00332     for (nit = top->NBList().begin();
00333          nit != top->NBList().end();
00334          ++nit) {
00335         QMPair *pair = *nit;
00336 
00337         fprintf(out, "%5d %5d %5d e %4.7e h %4.7e dr %4.7f pbc %1d\n",
00338         pair->getId(), 
00339         pair->Seg1()->getId(),
00340         pair->Seg2()->getId(),
00341         pair->getJeff2(-1),
00342         pair->getJeff2(+1),
00343         pair->Dist(),
00344         (pair->HasGhost()) ? 1 : 0);
00345     }
00346 }

00349     ;
00350 }

00354 void StateServer::WriteEMP(FILE *out, Topology *top) {
00355 
00356     fprintf(out, "# ID   TYPE    _n.mps    _e.mps    _h.mps \n");
00357 
00358     vector< Segment* > ::iterator sit;
00359     for (sit = top->Segments().begin(); sit < top->Segments().end(); ++sit) {        
00360 
00361         fprintf(out, "%4d %5s %-30s %-30s %-30s \n",
00362                      (*sit)->getId(),
00363                      (*sit)->getName().c_str(),
00364                      ((*sit)->getName()+"_n.mps").c_str(),
00365                      ((*sit)->getName()+"_e.mps").c_str(),
00366                      ((*sit)->getName()+"_h.mps").c_str());
00367     }
00368 }
00369 
00370 void StateServer::WriteXMP(FILE *out, Topology *top) {
00371 
00372     fprintf(out, "# JOB_ID JOB_TAG    PAIR_ID    SEG1_ID SEG1_NAME SEG1_MPS  "
00373             " SEG2_ID SEG2_NAME SEG2_MPS \n");
00374 
00375     QMNBList::iterator nit;
00376     for (nit = top->NBList().begin();
00377          nit != top->NBList().end();
00378          nit++) {
00379 
00380         QMPair *qmpair = *nit;
00381 
00382        string prefix = "pair_"+boost::lexical_cast<string>(qmpair->getId())
00383                    +"_"+boost::lexical_cast<string>(qmpair->Seg1()->getId())
00384                    +"_"+boost::lexical_cast<string>(qmpair->Seg2()->getId());
00385        string tag = "tag_xxx";
00386 
00387         fprintf(out, "%5d %5s   %5d    %4d %5s %-30s   %4d %5s %-30s \n",
00388                      qmpair->getId(),
00389                      "tag_xxx",
00390                      qmpair->getId(),
00391                      qmpair->first->getId(),
00392                      qmpair->first->getName().c_str(),
00393                      (prefix+"_1.mps").c_str(),
00394                      qmpair->second->getId(),
00395                      qmpair->second->getName().c_str(),
00396                      (prefix+"_2.mps").c_str());
00397     }
00398 }
